html:
11.22.20  10:33 am   How long do you work on these projects of yours in general?

     my projects always take an inappropriately long time to make. much more time than it takes to view them. it's very unfair and i don't approve of this

     Like, how do you have enough time for other things, friends, works and so on?

      one way, would be to delay the projects even more

11.22.20  10:33 am   your videos look really unique, but it seems like you put a lot of work into making them perfect.

     ah but then why aren't they perfect

     have you thought about not making a video as perfect as it can be?

     yes, i actually hate perfect videos. that's the reason i've never made a perfect video

11.22.20  9:49 am   Any advice on opening oneself up to be more creative? I often feel like I don't live up to my potential for creativity

      try moving, not moving, and different combinations of moving and not moving

11.22.20  9:32 am   How long will your video take?

     i'm going to do way more than 1 video, but my videos always take an inappropriately long time to make. much more time than it takes to watch. it's very unfair and i don't approve of this

     Looking forward for it!

11.22.20  9:32 am   when will you make a new song?

      after i finish the video for the one i made recently

11.22.20  9:04 am   what's the ideal length for you when making instrumental music ?

     it depends on the length of the content

     How do you feel about 10+ min music ?

     for 10+ minute content, that's going to work great

11.22.20  8:53 am   Do you use autotune,

     no

      or do you just have a very special voice?

     you didn't mention the many other brands of pitch correction available, but i don't use any of them. to answer your other question, all voices are special

11.22.20  8:29 am   is it lyrics first than song or song first than lyrics?

     usually not for me

     little bit of both?

     almost never either of those, for me. i do it together

     does it come in a dream?

     occasionally, but 80% of my dream ideas are not quite good enough

11.22.20  4:22 am   I've been having a debate with a friend for a while now. In 'Mt saint helens is about to blow up', does the strength of the blimp correlate to how many movies and games you can play on it???

     no

      It should right?!

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.22.20  4:04 am   Can you name some of the problems you are having with the video you're currently making?

      the human brain has an important feature, called the infinity warning. it warns you whenever you are trying to do infinity. it says, 'warning, you are trying to do infinity, which is not possible so please stop now so your feelings don't get hurt from how impossible it would be to do infinity', well that part of my brain is unfortunately missing. this is a problem i have always had. every few years it gets more intense. in 2019 it blew the roof and walls straight off

11.22.20  3:52 am   How is Steve doing? Will we ever learn their real name?

     it's your name

     Is it still raining on the mountains?

     no

11.22.20  2:15 am   Is there actually a video or are we all just contestants on an extremely elaborate prank show?

      it is me who is on the prank show. the desired number of videos is drastically greater than 1. except everyone seems to keep saying 1. which is my least favorite number of videos

11.22.20  2:13 am   what was the bad thing you did in your "I did a bad thing" video?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

11.22.20  1:46 am   how do i feel alive again

      try moving, not moving, and different combinations of moving and not moving

11.22.20  12:55 am   any controversial thoughts on broccoli?

      put it on pizza

11.22.20  12:05 am   When will you deliver us a full length album of new material that you have recorded yourself?

      i would prefer to do even more songs than that, all released individually on a regular basis

11.22.20  12:01 am   have you set a deadline for yourself for your latest project?

     yes

     and do you mind telling us? (yes, i'm impatient, sorry)

     october 6, 2020. this is unfortunate, because that date has already passed

11.21.20  11:45 pm   everything tends to be boring, how do i prevent this

      make some new things

11.21.20  11:26 pm   where did you get your editing style from?

      the gutter, if not the sewer

11.21.20  11:25 pm   Hi Bill, What's your opinion on philosophy?

      i'll have to think about it

11.21.20  11:08 pm   why do so many people ask what your favorite creation is

      this is part of a conspiracy to make it seem like only 1 of them is important

11.21.20  10:55 pm   when is the right time to get a christmas tree?

      january 1. get the year started off right

11.21.20  10:06 pm   When is the next video

      doing it now

11.21.20  8:46 pm   Did you manage to get the PS5?

      no

11.21.20  8:32 pm   does "slow down" take place during an apocalyptic event?

     no

      the line "the universe is starting to shake"

     no, that is one of the weakest lines in the song. my original idea there was 'the record stores are running out of music, because most of them were sued by marvin gaye', but then i decided this was not nice because in most cases when people are sued about marvin gaye's music it is not actually marvin gaye himself who sues them

     and the stanza that starts with "the hurricanes and storms cover the landscape" kinda give me that impression...

     yes that part is apocalyptic

11.21.20  8:04 pm   whats the enemy of what you do?

      gremlins,

11.21.20  7:46 pm   What editing software do you use to make your videos?

      unfortunately i think they all suck, so i don't know. i should clarify, this is not any problem with any software, this is more of a personal problem i've been having

11.21.20  7:28 pm   My family gossips about me. how do I stop this?

      don't tell them anything

11.21.20  7:22 pm   how do you feel about profanity, do you have any principles on using it or is it just a "if I'm feeling it ill say bad words" kinda deal?

      new update coming out of switzerland this morning, all words are bad

11.21.20  6:56 pm   Why this website background is so depressing?

      to make the foreground inspiring in comparison

11.21.20  5:39 pm   what is your favorite video you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.21.20  5:14 pm   How well is the next video coming along

     pretty good but it has a lot of problems

     and can you give a sneak peak

     yes

11.21.20  4:03 pm   do you like colored lights?

      yes

11.21.20  3:47 pm   When is the next vid coming?

      as soon as possible

11.21.20  3:36 pm   Any idea's when your next video is coming out? 

      i thought i had an idea, but it has been proven incorrect, because it's in the past

11.21.20  3:04 pm   how many nanoseconds until you publish your next video?

      i don't know

11.21.20  2:35 pm   Do you have a favorite music format? Vinyl, CD, MC, File?

      actual live performance, in person. second favorite right now would be file

11.21.20  2:31 pm   Would you ever make songs that are intense or like a deep song cause those songs are cool i guess.

     according to my calculations, almost all of my songs are supposed to be intense and deep meaning. this is company policy

     P.S i still love your songs anyway.

     that is good news because according to your testimony i have failed egregiously

11.21.20  2:29 pm   Favourite utensil?

      table

11.21.20  2:05 pm   what do you think is your biggest flaw?

      the human brain has an important feature, called the infinity warning. it warns you whenever you are trying to do infinity. it says, 'warning, you are trying to do infinity, which is not possible so please stop now so your feelings don't get hurt from how impossible it would be to do infinity', well that part of my brain is unfortunately missing

11.21.20  1:39 pm   What was your inspiration for funny dolphin

      the steady and decisive curvature of the earth

11.21.20  1:04 pm   do you think your new video will be out anytime soon

      i thought it would already be out a long time ago

11.21.20  12:51 pm   You cannot go into this castle

      are you sure about that

11.21.20  12:46 pm   how do i learn to survive in an adult world with a creative mind

      sing songs of joy

11.21.20  12:23 pm   Do you think people can achieve anything if they work hard enough?

      maybe

11.21.20  12:20 pm   The world needs you the most, any new videos?

      yes

11.21.20  12:15 pm   When is the next video?

      doing it now

11.21.20  11:26 am   What do you want for Christmas this year?

      (ed harris voice) the procedures!!!!!!!!!! now!!!!!

11.21.20  11:07 am   Where is the climate change court?

      could be somewhere in the lithosphere

11.21.20  10:54 am   I'm trying to make a textural, ambient song for a game level I'm making. It's slow-going, because without a set rhythm or melody to latch onto, it feels like I pretty much have to start with either chords or with picking instruments that fit the mood. And in my experience starting with either of those usually doesn't take me very far. Any tips?

      it sounds like you are on the right track. it's possible you might want to try setting some sort of a deadline so you don't get too lost. because anything is possible, and this might be way easier than you would otherwise allow it to be
